attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the hunting ban is a necessary and just piece of legislation, and should be kept in law at all costs, and that the aristocracy, farmers and other supporters should find a different pastime to engage in than ordering their dogs to rip defenceless animals apart.  The undersigned reject animal cruelty in all its forms, but also reject animal rights extremists in favour of peaceful protest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
